synopsis.text: Thereâ€™s a new and thrilling escapade awaiting the Matsuno sextuplets in Osomatsu-san: Hipipo-zoku to Kagayaku Kajitsu! The siblings set off on a monumental quest to discover a fabled fruit that promises to fulfill the deepest desire of whoever dares to consume it. Along their journey, they encounter the peculiar Hipipo tribe on an island, adding an unexpected twist to their adventure. In celebration of the 6th anniversary of Osomatsu-san, this exciting tale is one of two new animation projects announced at the 'Fes Matsu-san '21' event, set to hit theaters in 2022. Prepare for a wild ride filled with laughter, mystery, and the enchanting allure of wish fulfillment!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
